meanings.definition: A radiosonde equipped with a radar reflector used to track wind speed and direction in the upper atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: The rawinsondes were launched to gather information about the wind.
meanings.sent2: Scientists rely on rawinsondes to study the movement of air currents.
meanings.sent3: The rawinsondes decided to have a race to see who could reach the highest altitude.
meanings.sent4: The rawinsondes danced in the sky, reflecting the radar signals back to the ground.
meanings.sent5: As the rawinsondes soared, they painted a picture of the atmospheric conditions.
